title: AI Enablement
tagline: Empower your team with practical AI training
overview: Get your team using AI effectively with hands-on training workshops. I'll analyze your workflows, identify where AI can help, and train your team on practical applicationsâ€”especially in areas like documentation and rapid iterations where AI excels.
whatIOffer: Hands-on training workshops using real work scenarios from your business
Workflow analysis to identify high-impact AI opportunities
Practical focus on areas where AI excels: documentation, testing, code assistance
Team empowerment strategies for sustainable AI adoption and continuous learning
howItWorks: Free consultation to understand your team's needs and pain points
Fixed-fee proposal based on estimated hours
Interactive workshops with hands-on training using actual work scenarios
Follow-up support materials and documentation for ongoing adoption
